name: Magnet Man (Bkush)
description: A ninja with magnetic powers? Similar to gravity guy, but with a magnet! Use your magnet to maneuver through enemies and get the highest score! Please use appropriate names on the leaderboard or I will have to remove you... Also, don't forget to check out my other games and how I make them! Will be uploading a devlog in the near future... would mean a lot: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWeC9syI8sC2wTvzZ60gu0Q
